title: 500ml Insulated Vacuum Bottle ? Leakproof, Stainless Steel Travel Flask (Random Color)
description:
Elevate your hydration game with our premium 500ml Vacuum Bottle?designed for performance, style, and convenience. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel, this double-wall insulated bottle maintains your drink?s temperature for hours, whether you?re sipping hot coffee on a chilly morning or enjoying a cold beverage under the sun.

Its sleek cylindrical design and metallic lid with a loop handle make it easy to carry and visually appealing. The leakproof seal ensures mess-free transport, while the BPA-free construction guarantees safe drinking. Available in a range of modern colors including green, dark gray, blue, black, and silver, this bottle complements any lifestyle?from office desks to hiking trails.

Whether you're commuting, working out, or traveling, this vacuum bottle is your reliable companion for hydration on the go.

Package Includes : 1 x bottle and 2 x cups (Random Colors)
